casebody.data:
Christopher MEJIA, Appellant,
v.
STATE of Missouri, Respondent. WD 80185 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: February 27, 2018 Natalie Hull Hoge, Assistant Appellate Defender, Kansas City, MO, Attorney for Appellant. Joshua D. Hawley, Attorney General, and Shaun J. Mackelprang, Assistant Attorney General, Jefferson City, MO, Attorneys for Respondent. Before Division IV: Mark D. Pfeiffer, Chief Judge, and Victor C. Howard and Cynthia L. Martin, Judges

Order

Per Curiam:

Mr. Christopher L. Mejia appeals from the judgment of the Circuit Court of Platte County, Missouri, denying his amended Rule 24.035 motion for post-conviction relief following an evidentiary hearing. Because a published opinion would have no precedential value, a memorandum of law has been provided to the parties. The judgment is affirmed. Rule 84.16(b).
